messages.msgSnippet: Oooh, I love that one! It s so fun to sing words like Gitche Gumee... but I always end up crying by the end. I don t know any Titanic songs, either... but I
messages.messageBody:
Oooh, I love that one! It's so fun to sing words like Gitche Gumee... but I always end up crying by the end. I don't know any Titanic songs, either... but I read The Perfect Storm, if that counts.
dar

-- Nancy Wooton <nancywooton@...> wrote:


On Mar 12, 2006, at 10:51 PM, Sandra Dodd wrote:

> The song about The Titanic is better.

Is it as good as "The Wreck of the Edmund Fitzgerald" (since I don't
know the one about Titanic)?

(Playing Six Degrees of Separation from the Subject Heading)


Nancy, who still hasn't read the article that started the thread...
